Package com.swordglowsblue.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe

Class CookingRecipeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swordglowsblue.artifice.api.builder.TypedJsonObject<JsonResource<com.google.gson.JsonObject>>
      • com.swordglowsblue.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe.RecipeBuilder<CookingRecipeBuilder>
        • com.swordglowsblue.artifice.api.builder.data.recipe.CookingRecipeBuilder
  • public final class CookingRecipeBuilder
extends RecipeBuilder<CookingRecipeBuilder>
    Builder for cooking recipes (namespace:recipes/id.json). Used for all types of cooking (smelting, blasting, smoking, campfire_cooking).
    See Also:
    Minecraft Wiki
